name: Ania Pietras
comment: Pro grade dust- and splash-protected body. Excellent in-camera film looks and Raw processing.

name: Judit Pacsai
comment: The Panasonic Lumix DC-S5 is a slimmer, more affordable full-frame camera, with loads of appeal for photographers shopping for an entry-level or midrange model.

name: Dan Cederholm
comment: With a stabilized 33MP sensor, 10-bit 4K, and fast autofocus, the Sony a7 IV is a compelling full-frame camera for creatives.

name: Cameron Moll
comment: The Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark III is a good pocket camera with a big 1-inch sensor, but it faces strong competition from smartphones and cameras alike.

name: Sandi Metz
comment: The Fujifilm X-S10 puts a proven image sensor into a camera body with a big grip that's better for telephoto lenses, and in-body stabilization for blur-free photos and video.

name: Jeffrey Zeldman
comment: The Sony ZV-1 is a pocketable camera with strong still image quality and features geared specifically toward vloggers.
